Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Contains classes used by a client to communicate with a server using RMI or Sockets.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RmiServerInterface
    This interface exposes some rmi-server's methods rmi-client can call.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    This class represent a client regardless of the type of connection (Rmi or Socket)
    RmiClient
    This class represent a client using rmi connection and implements the Rmi-client interface exposed to rmi server.
    SocketClient
    This class represent a client using socket connection.
    User
    This class is the executable class for the client-side of the game.
